message.content: {"id": "6656", "title": "Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller", "description": "", "OB": "The close button is supposed to stay on the same line as the label even when the view is resized smaller.", "EB": "Currently, when resizing a view like the Navigator to a smaller size, the close button moves below the label.", "SR": "The issue occurs on Linux when running build 20011127. It does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000."}

origin.input_prompt:

Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
